H0.text: who abolished the monarchy and declared france a republic. National Assembly

H1.text: who abolished the monarchy and declared france a republic. Maximilien Robespierre

H2.text: who abolished the monarchy and declared france a republic. Georges Danton

H3.text: who abolished the monarchy and declared france a republic. Convention

A4.text: The Convention's unanimous declaration of a French Republic on 21 September 1792 left open the fate of the former king.

A5.text: It was the first French government organized as a republic, abandoning the monarchy altogether.
